instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1990: What is A1990? A1990 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2018, 2019 with EMC3215, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01041, 820-01814..
definitions.820-01041: What is 820-01041? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 無升壓 pp5v _g3s 無 pp2v5 nand ssd0 無  

更換elc180  刷dfu  error 4042

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Please post in english (spanish eventually), if you need help.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> no boost 
pp5v _g3s no 
pp2v5 nand ssd0 no

  Replace elc180 to brush dfu error 4042

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
For the future, please post the MLB model in title; <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01041</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> in this case.
A short fault history may also help to diagnose if you write it on the first post.

We need some more information, like the actual machine behavior, USB-C ampmeter indication.
I can't find elc180 into schematic.
